# magical-blocks Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-12-03

## Active Technologies

- PHP 8.0+, JavaScript ES6+ (via @wordpress/scripts), CSS3 + `@wordpress/scripts` ^31.1.0, `@wordpress/blocks`, `@wordpress/components`, `@wordpress/block-editor`, `@wordpress/i18n`, `@wordpress/element`, `@wordpress/icons`, `swiper` (for carousel blocks) (001-gutenberg-template-library)

```text

tests/
```

## Commands

npm test; npm run lint

## Code Style

PHP 8.0+, JavaScript ES6+ (via @wordpress/scripts), CSS3: Follow standard conventions
